## Selected talks

```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
`%>%` = magrittr::`%>%`
talk_table = readr::read_csv("tables/talks.csv") %>%
  dplyr::mutate(title = ifelse(
    url == "NA",
    title,
    paste0("<a href='",
           url,
           "' target = '_blank'>",
           title,
           "</a>"))) %>%
  dplyr::select(-url) %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(desc(year))
DT::datatable(talk_table,
              escape = FALSE,
              options = list(dom = 't'),
              rownames = FALSE)
```
